snippet: Mathematical errors and a conspiracy theory cropped up in the debate among the Democrats vying for mayor of New York City, but few brazen howlers emerged.
abstract: Final debate among Democrats vying for mayor of New York City features few brazen howlers, wild exaggerations or embarrassing gotcha moments.
lead_paragraph: Mathematical errors and a conspiracy theory cropped up in the debate among the Democrats vying for mayor of New York City, but few brazen howlers emerged.

headline.main: Detours and Divisions, but Few Wild Exaggerations in Mayoral Debate
headline.print_headline: Detours and Divisions, but Review of Debate Facts Shows Few Wild Exaggerations
